document.full_text: cycling's governing body (uci) admitted on friday to drawing up a list in which it had estimated the 'doping risk' of each rider at last year's tour de france but regretted the document had been made public.
document.title: uci admit drawing up "suspicion index" list
lines_and_colors: cycling's governing body (uci) admitted on friday to drawing up a list in which it had estimated the 'doping risk' of each rider at last year's tour de france but regretted the document had been made public.
